author: paras@getbindu.com
name: movie-recommender-agent
description: AI-powered movie recommendation system that provides personalized film suggestions based on preferences, genres, ratings, and viewing history. Uses real-time movie data from Exa search to deliver up-to-date recommendations.

environment_variables.description: OpenRouter API key for LLM calls (alternative to OpenAI)
Exa API key for movie search and information (required)
Mem0 API key for memory operations
